title: BRIEF-Genworth Mortgage Insurance Australia Q3 Statutory Net Profit $25.1 Million
text:
BRIEF-Genworth Mortgage Insurance Australia Q3 Statutory Net Profit $25.1 Million

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 10:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Genworth Mortgage Insurance Australia Q3 Statutory Net Profit $25.1 Million Oct 30 (Reuters) - Genworth Mortgage Insurance Australia Ltd : * GENWORTH MORTGAGE INSURANCE AUSTRALIA LTD - STATUTORY NET PROFIT AFTER TAX IN 3Q19 OF $25.1 MILLION VERSUS $19.6 MILLION * GENWORTH MORTGAGE INSURANCE AUSTRALIA LTD - NET EARNED PREMIUM IN 3Q19 OF $76.2 MILLION UP 11.9% FROM 3Q18 * GENWORTH MORTGAGE INSURANCE AUSTRALIA LTD - DECLARED AN UNFRANKED SPECIAL DIVIDEND OF 24.2 CENTS PER SHARE PAYABLE ON 28 NOVEMBER 2019 * GENWORTH MORTGAGE INSURANCE AUSTRALIA - GUIDANCE PROVIDED BY CO IN ITS FY18 RESULTS ANNOUNCEMENT REMAINS UNCHANGED * GENWORTH MORTGAGE INSURANCE AUSTRALIA LTD - CONTINUES TO TARGET AN ORDINARY DIVIDEND PAYOUT RATIO RANGE OF 50% TO 80% OF UNDERLYING NPAT

BRIEF-Genworth Mortgage Insurance Australia Q3 Statutory Net Profit $25.1 Million
description: BRIEF-Genworth Mortgage Insurance Australia Q3 Statutory Net Profit $25.1 Million
